Rotation.RotationNotes:
Demonology Warlock Profile. Re-written from the ground up to support the immensive playstyle of the Warlock. Ready for 5.3 and beyond!
Comes ready with a Single-target, Cleave and a AoE profile for all your damaging needs.
Support: - Automatic Soulstoning of Tanks and Healers (Will require assigned roles for the moment) - Automatic Buffing - Fully automated Pet Management - Automatic Dark Regeneration - Toggle between manual or automatic Mortal Coil usage - Automatic Boss dotting - Automatic Focus dotting - Automatic Mouseover dotting - DoT Tracking System - DoT Power Tracking System - Full UVLS Support .. and much much more!
Fully customizable keybindings!
Everything is completely configurable in-game for the ultimate custom play experience!
